title: 175 k on the ACCORD
description: With 175K on the clock of our 2015 Accord, we are trying to keep her running strong. It is using about a quart between changes, not leaking but I understand Honda used low pressure / low friction piston rings, which work well up to about 100K miles then the oil leaks into the cylinder. I am trying this oil to slow the consumption, time will tell. That being said, I am a Pennzoil guy and have used their 100 percent synthetic in this car since new and everything looks good and clean on the valve train. Keep is up Pennzoil!
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023

title: Hyundai Santa Fe 2007
description: Este lubricante le cayó como anillo al dedo a mi Santa Fe, el motor está más silencioso, sereno, más potencia, mejoró un poco el rendimiento de combustible, suave y lo mejor de todo es al encender en motor frío. Anterior a este aceite usaba Liquid Moly y cuando encendía hacia un ruido como de cadena pero con este aceite no se siente ni escucha nada.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
